articles.author: Paul Glader
articles.title: Four takeaways from Walter Isaacson’s biography of Elon Musk - CNN
articles.description: “You’ll never be successful,” Errol Musk in 1989 told his 17-year-old son Elon, who was then preparing to fly from South Africa to Canada to find relatives and a college education.
articles.content:
